channel.title: Adding an item each time staff logs in

item.title: Adding an item each time staff logs in
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.source: Adding an item each time staff logs in

item.title: Adding an item each time staff logs in
item.dc:creator: @runeuser8687 runeuser8687
item.description:
@runeuser8687 wrote:

owns reece:

ur trying to add it to the starter but why would someone start with staff u have to make them staff after they have made the acc

thats the only place i knew of that would add the item automatically each time the staff member logs in, and its not a real starter, i tried coding if (starter > 0 && playerRights >= 1) { addItem(1635, 1); }

you’d have to relog anyways to even get the ring since the starter must be > 0

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:4, topic:400889”]EDIT: I missread the post,
find you’re initialize method,
and add this

if (playerRights >= 1) { addItem(1635, 1); }[/quote]

that worked, thank u very much

Read full topic

item.title: Adding an item each time staff logs in
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

if (starter == 0) {
starter = 1;
addItem(995, 5000000);
addItem(1067, 1);
addItem(1153, 1);
addItem(1191, 1);
addItem(1323, 1);
addItem(1115, 1);
addItem(1333, 1);
addItem(3105, 1);
addItem(386, 250);
addItem(7458, 1);
addItem(1725, 1);
addItem(3759, 1);
addItem(1713, 1);
addItem(784, 1);
q1 = 15;
q2 = 15;
q3 = 15;
q4 = 15;
q5 = 15;
q6 = 15;
q7 = 15;
q8 = 15;
q9 = 15;
q10 = 15;
q11 = 15;
q15 = 15;
killedJad = 1;

                            NpcDialogue = 153;
                            NpcDialogueSend = false;
                            } else if (starter == 1 && playerRights >= 1) {
                                  starter == 2;
                                  addItem(1635, 1);
                            }

item.source: Adding an item each time staff logs in

item.title: Adding an item each time staff logs in
item.dc:creator: @runeuser8687 runeuser8687
item.description:
@runeuser8687 wrote:

hi im using the Frozn Tyme client/source (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,494307.0.html) and i need help with a probably very simple problem… i’m a noob coder so idk much about anything. here’s the code that i tried adding into the starter, it’s to give staff members a staff ring (p ring) each time they log in.

if (starter > 0 && playerRights >= 1) { addItem(1635, 1);

so it looks like this altogether:

[code=java]

		if (starter > 0 && playerRights >= 1) {
			addItem(1635, 1);
		}			
		if (starter == 0) {
			starter = 1;
			addItem(995, 5000000);
			addItem(1067, 1);
			addItem(1153, 1);
			addItem(1191, 1);
			addItem(1323, 1);
			addItem(1115, 1);
			addItem(1333, 1);
			addItem(3105, 1);
			addItem(386, 250);
			addItem(7458, 1);
			addItem(1725, 1);
			addItem(3759, 1);
			addItem(1713, 1);
			addItem(784, 1);
			q1 = 15;
			q2 = 15;
			q3 = 15;
			q4 = 15;
			q5 = 15;
			q6 = 15;
			q7 = 15;
			q8 = 15;
			q9 = 15;
			q10 = 15;
			q11 = 15;
			q15 = 15;
			killedJad = 1;

			NpcDialogue = 153;
			NpcDialogueSend = false;
			}

		pGender = input[0];
		pHead = input[1];
		pBeard = input[2]; // aka Jaw :S -bakatool
		pTorso = input[3];
		pArms = input[4];
		pHands = input[5];
		pLegs = input[6];
		pFeet = input[7];
		pHairC = input[8];
		pTorsoC = input[9];
		pLegsC = input[10];
		pFeetC = input[11];
		pSkinC = input[12];
		playerLook[0] = input[0]; // pGender -bakatool
		playerLook[1] = input[8]; // hairC -bakatool
		playerLook[2] = input[9]; // torsoC -bakatool
		playerLook[3] = input[10]; // legsC -bakatool
		playerLook[4] = input[11]; // feetC -bakatool
		playerLook[5] = input[12]; // skinC -bakatool
		apset = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		lookUpdate = true;

		break;[/code]

i don’t get any errors in my compiler, but there’s no ring when i log in, any suggestions?

Thanks, Dustin

Read full topic
